note.snippet: Ahamaggiṃ paricare, tato me suddhi hohiti

note.original: yadā hosi tuvaṃ (syā.), sadā hohiti tvaṃ (ka.)
note.snippet: Puṇṇako nāma nāmena, sadā hohi tuvaṃ

note.original: arahā tvaṃ bhavissasi (sī. pī.), arahattaṃ gamissasi (syā.)
aho buddho aho dhammo (sī.) theragā. 201 theragāthāya tadaṭṭhakathāya ca saṃsandetabbaṃ

note.snippet: Mama sappiṃ upādāya, kalabhāgaṃ na hessati

note.original: cirasaṃrasapākā ca (syā.), viṭapā ca sapākā ca (pī), vidaparapadādayo (ka.)
aṭṭhaṅgā ca supupphitā (sī.), kaṭṭhaṅgā ca supupphitā (pī.)
note.snippet: Kosambā saḷalā nīpā, aṭṭhaṅgāpi ca pupphitā

note.original: asokapiṇḍī ca varī (sī. syā.), asokapiṇḍī ca vārī (pī.)

note.snippet: Parāyaṇo patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttama
